documentation.text:
@dev Provides a set of functions to operate with Base64 strings.
 _Available since v4.5._

documentation.text: @dev Converts a `bytes` to its Bytes64 `string` representation.

natspec.details: Provides a set of functions to operate with Base64 strings. _Available since v4.5._

opcodes: PUSH20 0x0 ADDRESS EQ PUSH1 0x80 PUSH1 0x40 MSTORE PUSH1 0x0 DUP1 REVERT INVALID LOG2 PUSH5 0x6970667358 0x22 SLT KECCAK256 DUP4 LOG2 0xC0 0x26 DUP15 DUP1 SLOAD 0xE9 0xC2 SWAP3 0x4A PUSH15 0xE6E7633F10364B35344C75232BB844 0x4E PUSH4 0x70B12164 PUSH20 0x6F6C634300080D00330000000000000000000000
